name: reviewUnsavedDocuments(withAlertTitle:cancellable:delegate:didReviewAllSelector:contextInfo:)
desc: Displays an alert asking if the user wants to review unsaved documents, quit regardless of unsaved documents, or cancel the save operation.

                cancellable: Bool, 
                   delegate: Any?, 
       didReviewAllSelector: Selector?, 
                contextInfo: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?)
